0x00002da0 : 0x810ffff8 531592 -768  65535 1024 768 0 0 0 0 0 0 71816 32 43952 523988 0x1193c
0x00002da1 : 0x81100004 531592 0     65535 1024 768 0 0 0 0 0 0 71816 32 43952 523988 0x1193c
0x00002da1 : 0x81100004 531592 43952 65535 1024 768 0 0 0 0 0 0 71816 32 43952 523988 0x1193c

bin(531592)  -> 1000 0001 1100 1000 1000
bin(0xffff8) -> 1111 1111 1111 1111 1000
+             1 1000 0001 1100 1000 0000

0xfffff      -> 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111
bin(0x81c80) -> 1000 0001 1100 1000 0000
bin(0x181c80) 1 1000 0001 1100 1000 0000


With sign extension:
bin(0xffff8) ->                1111 1111 1111 1111 1000
 0xfffffff8  -> 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1000

0b11111111111111111111111111111000
